All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BoardFactory
 
CheckerBoard
This abstract class serves as a base class for all types of checkerboards: 8x8 10x10 etc.
ConsoleUI
This class serves the UI for the Game.
GameController
This class represents the Game Controller.
Human
This class represents a Human player
King
This class represents a King piece.
Letter
Enum representing the columns of the board
Main
 
Man
This class represents a Man piece.
Move
This class represents a move made on the board
Piece
This abstract class serves a base class for different type of piece such as King and Man and their capabilities It declares methods and attributed common to all pieces
Player
This abstract class severs as a base class for the different types of players: Human or Computer
PlayerSymbol
Enum representing a player symbol X or O
Position
This class represents the x and y coordinate on the checker's board
StandardCheckerBoard
This class represents standard 8x8 checkerboard.
UI
This interface serves as a contract to be fulfilled by any class that wants to take up the responsibility of being UI
